website_summaries.verdict: A strong screen that seems to last a little longer than other similar products.
pros: Very strong magnet that still separates easily for dogs and children to push through
closes behind you without effort to keep your door opening protected from bugs
Good customer service from the company
cons: Like other magnetic screen doors, you need to carefully check the size of your door before you buy

website_summaries.verdict: It's versatile to install and looks good, but it also comes with some quality issues that are potentially frustrating.
pros: Features strong magnets and a handsome finish that blends nicely into existing frames
cons: Difficult to close the middle completely, resulting in gaps which can let bugs in
If you use the tacks instead of Velcro, they aren't strong enough to go through some wood
Screen material is prone to tearing

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Works PERFECTLY! We purchased this item so that our dogs would be able to go in and out freely without there just being a wide opening into our house for bugs to just fly in, must say it was well worth the money! Our dogs run right in and out and it magnitizes perfectly back together each time! Definitely would recommend. As you can see in the video it snaps back together quickly and efficiently with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were easy to follow!
customer_reviews.text: We removed our aluminum screen door and installed this in it's place--our dog really likes it and it works as advertised! I can't rate the durability, as I just installed it, but the material seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A Parker

customer_reviews.title: On my 3rd one and that's a good thing!
customer_reviews.text: Best magnetic screen I've found. I have 4 dogs from large to small. They can all use this without issue. Keeping out the deer ticks and black flies is just a bonus. I don't bother taking them down in the fall/winter as there is always at least one nice day. I get a full year of use and that's all I can expect and more. As I said, on my 3rd one, so it must be good right?
customer_reviews.author: Cliff B

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, makes life easier!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this product at a friend’s house who has been using this screen for years. My dogs always walk through my screen door and continuously put holes in it, which results in unwanted bugs and birds finding their way in. I bought this as a solution. This was easy to install, it took me less than five minutes. It’s only been a few weeks but I have been very pleased with this product. When my dogs go into my screened in porch, the screen immediately closes after them. My porch will be a more enjoyable place this summer with this screen.
customer_reviews.author: RunningMom4

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! I have a 5 month old puppy and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I have a 5 month old puppy and have been potty training her, which involves constantly opening and closing the screen door to let her out. With this magnetic screen she can let herself out and it’s been wonderful. It was a breeze to install too - went up in about 15 minutes. I have a metal door frame so I used the Velcro strips and it was super easy. Great product and perfect for dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie C.

customer_reviews.title: Best screen door
customer_reviews.text: Best magnetic screen door: 1. Low cost 2. Easy install 3. Wind resistant; better than traditional swing screen doors 4. Easily removal for winter if desired 5. Dogs learned quickly and we don't have to cater to their in and out needs as much
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to attach and very durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the availability of the Velcro to use just in case, the instructions need to be improved on, but overall it was easy to attach after hammering the first two pins and so far (2 weeks) it had been durable
customer_reviews.author: Joel Eulo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than the one I replaced. Really easy to install and everything you need is in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: JDL1950

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because we needed to keep the bugs out but let the dog out on her own. It works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Not my first one
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd or 4th screen door that I have purchased from them and they are very well made and easy to install. I am running out of doors but if I need another I am buying this one, again. I also like kittens, Flux knows why. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: T Squared

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: This is the second year I have ordered this screen. I have two cats and two dogs who are very hard on it but it held up last summer really well and just ended up with a couple of tears at the bottom where the cats clawed it. It is really easy to install and the magnetic closure is strong and works great.
customer_reviews.author: CareyMolter

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: I have alot of pain in my wrist , opening my security screen door was not enjoyable. I installed this screen between door & security screen door( I just prop it open) and it works great when I'm going in / out alot .
customer_reviews.author: laurie aselin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So simple to install and exactly what I needed! Dogs and cat go in and out easily, keeps bugs out, allows breeze in, and looks great. I've had a few friends come over and ask me where I got this because they wanted one. I searched online for magnetic screen doors and this one seemed to get the best reviews and was so reasonably priced. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Works as advertised. Only thing is that it doesn't hold up to constant dog traffic in and out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I only wish!
customer_reviews.text: I only wished I had ordered this instead of the doggy door that my chihuahua-terrier won’t use. She has no problems going in & out of the mesh screen. So I can now relax & not have to constantly be getting up & down to let her outside.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Beware, cheap, janky screen!
customer_reviews.text: Last year I purchased from Amazon the screen in the first picture- it’s perfect ; easy to hang, ALWAYS closes securely & doesn’t distract from the view. This year I wanted one for my front door-unfortunately last year’s screen is no longer available. I ordered the one in the 2nd picture; obviously it does NOT close securely, lines running down (why oh, WHY? Looks & feels like bars) the screen distract from the view and the screen material is light weight (may be why it doesn’t hang well?). And, it costs 50% more than last year’s superior version. Thankful for amazon’s easy return.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! So easy to install, I was so suprised! Took me less than 10 minutes to install and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This screen was easy to install. If installing on a wood frame, don't bother with the sanding as it tacks in. Perfect for dogs! If you have a metal door, it will sometimes stick open and attach to the door. Otherwise, super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise E.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad...
customer_reviews.text: "Hemming" this product takes a lot of time. I hemmed it perfectly the first time but it was too taut so the screen wouldn't close on its own. I then re did the hemming to make it a little looser but the magnets just aren't strong enough to close the screen (see pictures).
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Update: This is a well made product. I returned the set that was missing the installation kit and re-ordered a new one. I installed it within 10 minutes. I highly recommend this as long as they dont make any changes to make it cheaper for them to make. I ordered 2x set of magnetic screen doors. I think they are great but only one set of installation kit (velcro and thumb tacs) came with it. I paid for 2 set i need to get my 2 installation kits!!! I'll update this when i get my 2nd set of installation kit.
customer_reviews.author: Pogi

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing Since Sliced Bread!
customer_reviews.text: We love this screen! It was easy to fit to the door and went up easily. It works very well and comes together easily. If there is a wind blowing it may need a little help coming together, but it hasn't been much of a problem. Both dogs learned quickly to come through the screen. Two days after having it up we ordered two more screens. One for the basement door and one for our daughter who loved it so much she wanted one.
customer_reviews.author: Twoapples

customer_reviews.title: Truly PHENOMENAL!
customer_reviews.text: We have double screen doors and replaced with two of these. I am thrilled with the results, and plan to remove the wooden screen doors permanently! My dogs can go in and out and it re-seals right behind them, and we have not had a mosquito or fly make it onto the porch yet!! I just wish it came in a wider width to eliminate the dark vertical edge lines, but I don't mind overlapping two, because they work beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Best screen ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 10+ xbrand magnetic screen doors over the last 5 years as they are so convenient for our large dogs (whom won't fit through doggie doors) and our 4 busy , in and out, up and down, back and forth children. And this screen is by far the best quality, most sturdy and easy installation, and without a doubt most affordable for the quality. I could not be more satisfied with the product. The day we installed it we had 4 friends ask us for the brand so they could purchase one for their homes! Rave reviews all around!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great door!!
customer_reviews.text: Did better than I had hoped for . I have metal doors- yes magnets stick to door but easily corrected with a brush of hand - magnets are many & strong. Was concerned about cats clawing at screen but screening material is high quality and cats learned quickly that door opens with a push of their head. When they did initially stand up to claw the screen it opened with their weight but closed shut after they fell forward and into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: GOODBYE MOSQUITOS. GO SUCK BLOOD ELSEWHERE!!!
customer_reviews.text: We live right next to a slough. Mosquitos were sucking our blood every night. We were knee deep in tree tea oil to stop the itching. I was fed up with those little suckers and decided to give this screen door a try. I love it. My family loves it. The instillation was easy and it looks great. I can now leave the door open without the fear of those blood sucking mosquitos sucking me dry and leaving me itching for days!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a weekof regular use.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even used it for a week and already ripping at the top seam... just regular use of going in and out.. not running through it, no animals jumping on it or anything. Really upset
customer_reviews.author: channing

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: First 1 was ripped by 100lb neurotic German shepherd that we were watching for the kids while they were on vacation (she was outside and the wind blew the inside door shut where she couldn't see anyone, lol). Until then absolutely no problems and we loved the full length magnets that closed the sides together. It's a great product so we bought it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Webster

customer_reviews.title: Self closing and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service! The first screen I received had a problem with the top magnets connecting properly, I contacted the seller and they sent a replacement very quickly. The second screen magnets line up properly and I am very pleased. We had a single screen hanging from a tension rod that I purchased at a big box store, it was stiff, the tension rod would fall down if someone grabbed with too much "umph". This screen is softer, has heavy duty Velcro and hasn't budged! Love that it is easy to walk through and closes right behind you, hands free! We really like it -- it works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: MommaCass

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit narrow doors.
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to fit all doors under the max specs. It doesn't. The door has to be 34 inches wide.
customer_reviews.author: Sigaze

customer_reviews.title: The tacks included were flimsy and half of them broke ...
customer_reviews.text: The tacks included were flimsy and half of them broke while being hammered in, leaving me with barely enough to complete the job. The door worked for a few weeks, and then stopped magnetizing back together after you walked through it. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Erase

customer_reviews.title: Ripped at seam while putting up, I sewed it ...
customer_reviews.text: Ripped at seam while putting up, I sewed it thinking probably just a fluke but then it didn't even work.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce w Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to put up and works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put up and works great. Both my dogs learned how to go through with no probably right away so that's great. It was a little long for my door but I just stalled it up about 2 inches and that was actually great because I put a couple stones in it to weigh it door so it always closes
customer_reviews.author: Cloudy

customer_reviews.title: Such a clever design
customer_reviews.text: Great magnets keep this thing looking and working well. My 3 big dogs and even the cat figured out how to use it. I think someone got confused and tangled up in the door or something because I have to tack the opening at the very top to keep it functioning correctly. But when I need a replacement this is definitely the one I'll get.
customer_reviews.author: Cinobey6

customer_reviews.title: Great quality so far
customer_reviews.text: Great quality so far, and opens and closes easily. It's on my front door though, so it's hard to get around it to unlock the door and when carrying in groceries. My door is also metal, so sometimes it sticks, and lets bugs in until we notice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for anyone that enjoys leaving their door open ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for anyone that enjoys leaving their door open to either let in some fresh air or allow your pets free entry in and out of the house. It took me all of 5 minutes to install. My doorframe was wooden, so I simply used the included tacks and hammered them in about ever 6 inches. I had to rollup one of the sides a few times to reduce the width to fit my door. The product works very well, and appears to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install + Dog Friendly = Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Every since I moved into my apartment, I knew I needed a screen for my porch. I was nervous to order this product. However, this product was a dream to install. I used the Velcro strips to attach the screen to the doorway - allowing for easy removal later. My two large dogs quickly figured out how to open the screen door. The magnets almost always close the door behind them. Careful if your door is magnetized, the screen can get caught on it. However, this only happens when my dog charges full speed through the screen. When humans go through, this is not a problem. This product is really worth the value!
customer_reviews.author: Destin

customer_reviews.title: Fresh air, no more bugs!
customer_reviews.text: It’s keeping the bugs out and letting the fresh air in. That makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Covey

customer_reviews.title: Metal Door
customer_reviews.text: We love the screen. We have it on our 32 inch wide back door. One item for you to consider is that we have a metal back door. When coming in the screen sticks open as it sticks to the open door. This is not a problem for us because we are so delighted to have a screen that our little dog easily adapted to. (this replaces a screen door) We find it a advantage, however, when bring in groceries because it will hold it open for us for multiple trips to the car. Going out the door it works with no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with quality and easy installation!
customer_reviews.text: Installing the magnetic screen door was very easy and quick, just as advertised. My wife and I are so impressed with the good quality for such a reasonable price and how well your product fits the doorframe of our back door. It took our dogs only a couple of tries before they got the hang of coming in/out through the screen opening. The magnetic strips are strong so the screen opening closes back up quickly to keep out annoying flies and mosquitoes. We will be definitely recommending this magnetic screen door to our friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good magnets, so far no issues with installation quality.
customer_reviews.text: We like to leave our door open for our dog to come and go in the yard but bugs have always been an issue. Nearly completely solved with this installation. The magnets are a good strength so my toddler can easily open it to go play outside but it closes right up after without any fiddling with it. The dog learned quickly how to use it and isn't scared of it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. Installation was easy and the material is enough for its purpose. No complains.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Florero

customer_reviews.title: A+++, Perfect transaction, Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic screen door has solved the problem of an in-and-out to the backyard for the dog, as well as being a barrier for the now-emerging mosquitoes and nature's other nuisances that will be showing up soon. We purchased this screen as a temporary solution until the new doors are installed, but it is well built and at this stage it seems that it could be functional for years. I recommend this screen as a great solution and I also am impressed with the vendors. Rebecca has provided great customer service; had we needed assistance with our order she was there to help. Five stars for the people and the product!
customer_reviews.author: V. L. Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, would be better if the tacos were a little longer
customer_reviews.author: Eucker53

customer_reviews.title: Space out tracks to have enough
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything except didn't come with enough tracks to mount to wood frame
customer_reviews.author: Gary Rumping

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many of these screens and by far this is the most well made, efficient and easy to install of them all. Worth the extra price. The cheaper ones are cheaper; you get stringy threads, they are not as long nor wide. This one is it! No drama!
customer_reviews.author: Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Should have tried this a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: I needed something so that my dogs could go in and out, but keep the bugs mostly out. I gave this one a try. I installed it with the provided thumb tacks in minutes. (It also comes with Velcro, but I did not need that.) My smart dog started using the door after only 3 training attempts. He loves it. My not so smart dog took a little longer to overcome his fear, but he was using it within a half day. The product seems very well made and very robust. So far, I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B.

customer_reviews.title: This screen seems a little nicer than others. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This screen seems a little nicer than others. I installed it on the sliding glass door. My lab figured it out in a second. She is the reason I needed to replace the original screen .
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Have had three other brands that have all latest about one week. I have three dogs and all of them love to run in and out of the back door constantly. Great news this one has been I use for the last three weeks and still looks like it just got hung up today. Excellent quality and construction.
customer_reviews.author: RAMANATOR

customer_reviews.title: is very very good. I have a small patio where I live ...
customer_reviews.text: Hello All, I never leave a review for anything. Really not my style and I believe differences in opinion, culture, and background influence "Likes" and "Dis-likes". This product, however, is very very good. I have a small patio where I live and it is perfect for having some nice outdoor air and space. Issue is always bugs!! The Magnetic Screen Door was such an easy install and truly works as intended. The magnets make a reassuring little 'click' when snapping back together and my girlfriends dog loves being able to jump in and out as he pleases. Really a steal for the price and quality of the product I received. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job of keeping the bugs out but the best ...
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying the Screen Door very much. Does a great job of keeping the bugs out but the best thing is it shuts so easy and no more slamming. We have an old specially made door with no screen and a regular screen door won't fit. No problem with this one and we were able to put it up in only a few minutes. There is only one problem we have and that is that our door is metallic and sometimes the screen will stick to it. Very simple to move it and walla... the screen is again shut. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Carol Herman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a screen door that would allow my dog to let herself in and out. It was incredibly easy to install and works perfectly! I love being able to have my sliding glass door open without flies and other bugs wandering into my house. I highly recommend this product and would buy it again if I need screens on any other doors in my home.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jentzsch

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is so fantastic. I have a sliding glass door that didn't have a screen and I wanted to be able to open my back door and get some fresh air and not let the bugs in or my cats out. I Figured out a way to install it so it works just like I wanted to. I installed it all by myself which wasn't too hard. I even added my own Velcro to the bottom so the cats won't get out. Love this product. Will buy again in the next rental we end up living in.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I like how the magnets are inside the lining. Cheap ones have the magnets on the outside and they fall off. Easy to install: my door is a little short so I wrapped the top of the screen around a piece of wood and secured that to the top of my door there is enough Velcro for three sides easy to walk through, and it closes automatically when the dogs walk through it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money.. This screen has been up for 5 days and already has huge tear in the seam
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cholas

customer_reviews.title: The best $28 EVER SPENT
customer_reviews.text: My 85 year old Dad lives in a retirement community. Each unit/apartment comes with an amazing balcony (door access from the master bedroom). In the evening Dad loves to sit on his balcony enjoying a glass of wine, ok maybe two. Problem was, the bugs come inside. He asked the community management about a screen door. They said "sure no problem, the cost will be $500". I did some homework and found these magnetic screen doors. $28, seriously worth a try. Installation took ... maybe 5 minutes and it looks great!!! LOVE IT!!!! The best $28 ever spent. Highly, highly recommend this screen door, and have done so with several other residents.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy low-harris

customer_reviews.title: Good screen to allow dogs to go in and out.
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing this. Good directions and plenty of Velcro to put all around. We used a staple gun instead of the tacks.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: It works but not perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We got this so our dog could go in and out of our patio door without us always needing to open the screen for him. Installation was easy enough and the directions with pictures were nice. However, there is a couple inch gap at the top that doesn't have magnets that won't close shut and leaves an opening for bugs to get in. If it is a little windy out, the magnets won't pull together without assistance and nor will they close on their own if we go out the door. It seems to work okay if just the dog goes through. Overall, it works for us for the most part, but could use some improvements for sure
customer_reviews.author: nursetraveler

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed. What a great idea. Easy to install, easier to take down for winter. The seal is imperfect at the bottom, so an odd mosquito may find the hole, but I'm okay with it. Two problems: It sticks to the steel door and takes a little futzing to unstick it. That is not the fault of the product. Very difficult to carry large items, like a box, through it. Almost have to take it down. I'm 6'1" and the top will only part for me if I walk through the exact center. Okay, three problems.
customer_reviews.author: GeoMac

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - Magnets are weak, don't line up ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy - Magnets are weak, don't line up, don't stay closed - When the dog walks thru (the whole point of a magnetic screen), instead of snapping back the screen just blows in the wind... Final straw - Flux Phenom instructions clearly say "Don't contact Amazon, call our Customer Service - Lifetime Warranty" - Well there is NO PHONE NUMBER. I tried the CS email, it's been 3 days, no response. This product is getting returned, as soon as the replacement is delivered.
customer_reviews.author: A Disgruntled Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic...for a week.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to setup within minutes. I was thrilled to finally not worry about a patio door to open and close going to the outside and BBQ and our two dogs enjoyed the freedom. After a week the magnets were not pulling themselves closed leaving gaps in several spots. I took it down and refitted and it sort of helped for a day but wouldn't come together any more. At the end of the 2nd week it was pretty much just a curtain that stayed open and the bottom started to fray. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tilton

customer_reviews.title: Does not close tightly. Gaps will allow bugs.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like I'm in the minority, but this is not at all what I had expected. Saw a magnetic screen door at friend's home that worked beautifully. Let go and it snapped together with a tight seam. This one? not so much. The magnets have large gaps between them, leaving significant holes that bugs can easily get through. The magnets seem to be of quite low quality and do not attract each other much. Not sure why my experience seems to be the minority here, but please beware.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: NO TIE-BACK STRAPS!!
customer_reviews.text: "What’s that you say? Pull back the screen doors and tie them off to side because you don’t want them in the way right now. Got it." "Ahhh.... Wait a sec. There are no straps to tie the doors back on this door. Guess you’ll just have to have them always in the closed position.” Beyond idiotic. Other than that, its a decent door. If its to long, you won’t be able to use the velcro on the top, just the pins they give you. Be advised, you will need to drive these (basically) large them tacks into your door trim, so you will be leaving a mark. I’d give it a 4 star if not for the WTF oversight.
customer_reviews.author: clay holly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't always close and ripped
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my front door so the dogs could come and go as they please. Installed screen per directions, noticed right off the bat it doesn't always close unless the top is perfectly aligned. After some time of continuous pulling up the top and re-attaching to the velcro the screen ripped on one side of the top seam causing it to never close unless I manually do it myself, which defeats the purpose. The last screen I had lasted 4 summers and always worked perfectly. Had to replace it due to a dog scratching a hole in one side. Paid a lot more for that screen so I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Need warranty replacement
customer_reviews.text: Wow is this a joke. Just received our second flux phenom screen and it was return that was missing parts with the tacks still sticking out of the screen where the previous customer left them. Glad I didn't step on one that feel off. Plus you can tell that this was used because it doesn't work right. Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, just didn’t work for us.  Still recommend to others tho
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product. Very well made. Sadly I couldn’t use it due to how our security door is attached to our regular frame. I couldn’t return as it was literally that good of a products...so instead I gave to my neighbor for their dog. It works wonderfully and made me jealous lol. It was so well made that I actually considered taking down my security door to be able to use it. Sadly I’ll have to invest into an official dog door. Anyways, I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great screen! The vendor provides two types of mounting hardware: Velcro for hard, smooth surface mounting; push-pins/thumb tacks for wood framed doors and thresholds. My particular application was a wood-framed door to my master bedroom, just off of my deck. Although you need to pull the screen taut when mounting, don’t pull it too tight or the magnets won’t properly hold. Lastly, if you’re using the push pins/thumb tacks for installation, you definitely won’t need to use all of the included hardware. Overall, this is a quality product that serves its intended purpose. Oh yeah, my Labs enjoy the new freedom they have to be outside, too!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Wish this worked ;/
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have run through our screen door and it's no longer in use. I bought 1 of these for the dogs to come in and out- I love the concept of this- For me, the velcro was not strong enough, so the dogs were constantly undoing it from the "frame" The magnets work great- If it is too long, there are instructions to hem it. I highly suggest doing that. Our ripped within a week and I am returning it. I also wish they produced it in white. The black is "hard" on the white sliding door. I don't think i'll be buying this again. Just returning.
customer_reviews.author: savvygrl

customer_reviews.title: End of our flying bug problem.
customer_reviews.text: Our little dogs can push the door open to get in, but unfortunately they can’t close it behind them. That meant that flies and bees etc. could also get in. This door solved the problem perfectly. We are octogenarians and had no problem putting the door up in less than a half hour. Anyone else could do it in a lot less time. It was a great purchase. P.S. the dogs learned to go through in no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screen tearing after just a couple months
customer_reviews.text: Was relatively easy to install, basically just putting double-sided tape on the door frame. At first it was working well, but now the velcro is not holding terribly well, and there are several holes that my dogs have torn in the screen just by moving through it (not clawing it or anything like that). I Thought this would be a great replacement for a screen door, but I wouldn't waste my money again. Might try a different brand, because I like the idea, just not the durability of this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: Zach H

customer_reviews.title: Solid and durrable but know what you are getting
customer_reviews.text: Good quality screen magnets work well, Velcro is adequate. But know this before you buy. The bottom is unattached and floats over the the threshold so if you step up to the threshold this can be a large gap. The "hemming" they recommend to adjust height is a bit janky in my opinion. It works but it isn't simple and you need to provide your own paper clips.... But the screen itself, the Velcro, and magnets are all good quality.
customer_reviews.author: K. Seiffert

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: You can buy much cheaper versions of this item on Amazon but don't, I have tried them and the don't hold up. This is the one to buy. Stitching is good, magnets work great and the mesh is durable. I have a screened in patio and opening and closing the door to let the dogs out was a bit annoying but hey dogs gotta pee. The problem was flies were constantly getting in every time it was opened. After a hour of training them they go in and out whenever they want and no more bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Schwiegeraht

customer_reviews.title: Great screen! Works best with slack on top & not pulled tight!
customer_reviews.text: Great screen for the price!! Got this for my back door so we could leave the door open during the nice season of Spring in Texas. So glad I trusted the reviews and ordered this because it does exactly what we want it to! The trick to installing this correctly so that it will close and the magnets will stay secured is if you leave slack at the top. If you pull it too tightly, the screen doors will not close automatically because of the tension.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D

customer_reviews.title: Tremendously Cuts Down on Flies in the House
customer_reviews.text: Good screen. I never had so few flies in the house since I started using this last summer. I just replaced it because my dog chewed a hole in one of the corners. Pretty easy to install. It comes with double-sided tape, but I used strong (hardware type, not thumb) tacks spaced about 6 inches apart instead. My dogs tend to pull the tacks out in the bottom corners so I suggest doubling them up there. If you don't have dogs, you can probably go with a lot fewer tacks.
customer_reviews.author: K. N.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install: just make sure you leave some slack to allow both sides to fall back to the center so the magnets touch and can close. Adhesion: It comes with Velcro strip to secure to the door frame as well as tacks to hammer in for extra hold Durability: so far it seems to be pretty durable. We have a 1 yr old maltipoo and a 10 week old goldendoodle who just charges at, sometimes in the wrong spot but it has yet to tear or come loose.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana R.

customer_reviews.title: Closes and functions exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This door screen appears to be constructed of very strong, durable material and was easy to install (follow the enclosed instructions carefully). The tacks were somewhat difficult to grip and hammer without banging my fingers so I found it useful to hold them with long-nosed pliers. Alternatively, a stable gun with stainless steel staples might be a lot easier. I found it best to begin by anchoring the top, center portion with a tack on either side of the magnets - the remainder of the mounting process then easily followed. Our dog loves the freedom to run in and out of the house through it and the magnets immediately close and seal the opening each time.
customer_reviews.author: RPL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The screens are really great, because I have bought similar curtains in other places before but they are very unnecessary. Mosquitoes will fly in. The curtains in this house are made of magnetite and are very tightly closed.
customer_reviews.author: Jie shen

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper ---
customer_reviews.text: --- the printed instructions were okay but left me with a question or two. Found a video thru their site that did a really great job of showing exactly how to install the screen. They state it can be installed in just 5 minutes, which might be true if I were an octopus but I managed to get the job completed in about 30 minutes. I would buy this product again just to see if I can install the second one in just 5 minutes. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Happy with item and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I thought the screen was of good quality and it was pretty easy to install on my aluminum door frame. The hook and loop seems to be of good quality and I expect the adhesive to last a while. The most impressive thing about this item is not the screen itself, but the customer service. Two magnets on my door did not close all the way so I sent a picture to the folks asking their advice. The responded that day and sent me a new screen that I received within a week. Customer service is alive and well!
customer_reviews.author: Old Guy53

customer_reviews.title: Buyer note regarding tacs
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this except for the instruction's final photo shows many many more tacs than what is actually provided. I spaced mine like the photo and ran out! I considered rating at four stars but feel that every quality is awesome. Just a note to buyer.
customer_reviews.author: TrackDoll

customer_reviews.title: Magnets don’t run entire length
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one, same brand. The first one lasted a couple months but cats made holes in it and the magnets were not holding and on further investigation, the magnets had slipped down causing gaps. The 2nd one has magnets that are not as good and do not run the entire length. There are 2inch spots where there is no magnet. Bugs can get inside quite easily. I am returning and trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: thoughtsbecomethings

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I didn’t have the same experience as most of the reviewers on here. I’m a competent DIY-er, but no matter how I positioned the screen, it did not snap back together consistently. In fact, most of the time it did not. The wag of a passing tail or light breeze blowing keeps the magnets far enough apart that they don’t reconnect without manual help... which kinda defeats the purpose. Also, they send you exactly enough Velcro to do the job, so either install perfectly the first time, or realize that every reposition leaves a little more glue behind.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! We installed it in our backyard because we do not have a screen obviously but enjoy leaving the door open. Especially since it’s starting to get nice where we are. I have no complaints about this product, when installed correctly the magnets snap back closed after exiting. But it did take a couple times to install to get this right. The tacs that this came with aren’t very durable, we’ve had it up about a week and one side has lost 3 or 4 tacs, we aren’t rough with it at all. So definitely going to get something stronger to hold. But other than that I am happy with this purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Asya

customer_reviews.title: Update - Good company - initiated replacement that works well
customer_reviews.text: After leaving a bad review but electing not to return or ask for a refund, the company reached out to me and sent me a new screen and I received it earlier than promised. Apparently they had paid attention to my complaints because the new screen was modified (or the first one was just sub-par--I'm not sure which), it fit the door very nicely, the length was shorter so there were more magnets and not as long a gap at the top, the sewing followed the seams--not perfectly, but close enough, so that there are only the very tiniest of gaps. It closes better. Good company. I'm pleased and feel that I got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed so we could keep our balcony door open and let in some breeze. Set-up (nailing tacks to the outside door frame) took minutes, and that was it. MAKE SURE to leave the recommended space at the bottom, because if the bottom edge touches the floor, it will drag and may not close all the way to the end. There are many small magnets all along the two edges that meet, so whichever part opens also closes quickly. And with the magnets being small, it doesn't require any effort to open--usually we just walk right through, without using our hands, and it immediately closes behind us. Great value, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: L. Rothermel

customer_reviews.title: We never write reiews!
customer_reviews.text: We are Prime members and use Amazon reviews all the time to determine weather to make a purchase or not. This product scored highly so we purchased it. This screen door is a great purchase! We were originally going to order a $169 retractable screen door and happened across this item. We purchased it based on all the good reviews, SCORE!. Don't hesitate on making this purchase, it is easy to install, nice quality, durable, and works! We were hesitant due to the $25 price tag but this is a quality product and a steal of a price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item was defective
customer_reviews.text: Item received was defective. The strip where the right panel meets the left is just a half inch longer but that makes a huge difference and there is a huge gap of an inch where the two panel should meet at the top. This defeats the entire purpose of keeping bugs out and having a Tight Seal. Going to try and purchase again to get a working one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd ONE!! The best I've seen
customer_reviews.text: 2ND ONE!! This is our 2nd time buying this. The 1st one lasted 14 months and we have 3 dogs, grill out and entertain frequently. A little trick, put a magnet on a piece of velcro and slide it under the lip (that's what she said), creating the option to keep it open or closed. (See pictures). I'll probably buy more for backup and as gifts. It is very durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: The best dog door EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was super easy to install, and has the strongest magnets I've ever worked with. The screen closes tight, but opens at the most gentle nudge. I would recommend this to anyone with dogs that can go in a fenced-in yard in favor of a doggie door. The only thing is I wish the screen was made of a more durable material, as it started ripping at the bottom seam where the magnets connect. I'm sure my dogs had a lot to do with it, but it could have lasted longer than two weeks. Regardless, we're still using our ripped screen until I can get a replacement one. :)
customer_reviews.author: FloDawg

customer_reviews.title: Good luck
customer_reviews.text: This item is the biggest piece of garbage I’ve ever bought. When I bought this item, I was thinking that the “tacks” were going to be at least strong enough to hold the screen but they’re not even strong enough to withstand a butterfly. Every single time I hit one with my hammer, the tack broke right in half. Couldn’t even take more than one hit and it would just break. Not to mention, ALL of them were already bent when we received them. Not worth $30 AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 🔥Much better than the seen on tv type!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased several of the cheaper screen doors and they last about 6 months. This is by far the highest quality screen I’ve used. Many more and larger magnets. Also the magnets are sewn into the fabric not in plastic so no click click click when it closes, very little to no noise. It feels thicker, more like a curtain. We also have 4 small dogs (under 10lbs) that have no problem using the door. This door does cost about twice what I pay for the cheaper types but once using it I have no problem paying that amount! 🔥I do not use the installation kit, I just staple mine up.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install. I did it by myself - using both the tape and tacks. I did have to reinforce it with the heavy duty staples because my dogs like to play with it. I did also put some heavy magnets along the bottom to keep the bugs out. My dogs Figured it out quickly and they love the freedom to go in and out.
customer_reviews.author: JJP

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase
customer_reviews.text: My choice was to 1. constantly open (then shut) the door to let the dog out or 2. leave the door open and invite every fly in the world in or 3. not allow for the mornings cool air to cool the house down for the day. This was easy to install- although I choose to not totally follow directions entirely as I wanted to remove the screen nightly in order to close & lock the fixed door. This screen door allows me to easily attach it during the day and remove at night while keeping flies out and letting dog move in and out freely without barking for my assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy living

customer_reviews.title: This is the best of them.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other magnetic screen doors and this brand is far superior. Has all around adhesion to the door frame plus tacks to strengthen it even more. The magnets are seamed into the the full length of the opening which gives it the weight And magnet strength needed for it to close securely every time. The screen itself is fine enough mesh to stop all but the smallest of tiny no-see-ums, however it is fairly easy to tear with sharp objects or dogs jumping up on it so you must be careful about leading with you body and not pushing things in front of you when going thru. Over all extremely pleased with this screen!
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia Giorgi

customer_reviews.title: Works well with dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I was quickly able to train my two dogs to use it. We have a boxer and a boston. I want to add. Install it high enough so it is not resting on the ground. After a month my boxer caught his toe on it and it quickly became his Cape. I have boughten spares. I'm still very happy with it. Mine is installed on a sliding door.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Good Product?
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these screens on my back door for 3 years now and it is still working so well that I purchased two others for other doors. Because three of my outside doors open outward, there is no room for a screen door to hang. These screens are perfect solutions because they are flexible and both sides push towards the middle when opened. My dogs love them!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: We get a nice breeze through the door from our balcony. This screen keeps out the insects. The magnets are imbedded in the seams so there is no annoying clacking sound when it closes behind us. The velcro is already attached to the screen and has no gaps. The hooked side of the velcro glues to the door frame and is long enough to go from one end of the door frame, along the top and down the other side. The instructions are easy to follow. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Gets holes and tears easily.
customer_reviews.text: The product was great at first. But it didn't take but 2 weeks for holes to start to form in the screen and then it's took just over a month for the screen to tear at the top. I bought this product because I'm disabled and it would make letting my dogs in and outside easier. I'm now back to getting up every half hour or so to let my dogs out into my fenced back yard. We tried a temporary fix with duct tape but of course, due to heat it does not work. I have another one of these attached via the provided velcro strip and that also has torn and will no longer close.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cupp

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and they stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: The best way to install this is with the velcro that it comes with so that you have a nice seal around your door. But I just used pushpins to put it in temporarily, which is fine. It has easy-to-understand instructions on how to adjust it for the length/width of your door and the magnets that keep it closed align nicely and are the perfect strength. I do wish it was not quite so dark, I don't actually like having it in my door because it blocks our view too much. But it's nice to have a screen there that was cheap and easy to install, and will be easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product.
customer_reviews.text: We use this for out back door leading to our deck mainly so we can leave the door open in pleasant weather so the cat can go in and out yet have protection from flying insects. Works out really well and seems to last (we installed the screen about 7-8 months ago). No tears and tacks are holding well. For the price, I bought thinking I okay if it lasts just a full season and very happy if it lasts 2 seasons. It may very well last much longer. The magnetic closure works great, but you do need to be careful upon installation to ensure no stretching to ensure proper closure.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Great solution at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing that could've happened to our back porch - and our dog! The magnets are a brilliant idea, it closes itself behind you (or kids or dogs), exactly as described. Keeps the bugs out but allows total hands-free walkthrough. AMAZING. A way better option than a built-in pet door. I had our handyman install it because we had guests coming the next day, I knew he'd be faster than me. So, I can't speak from personal experience on the install but if not for the time crunch I'm sure it would have been no problem for me. I highly recommend it - sheer genius!
customer_reviews.author: N. Black

product_meta.title: Flux Phenom Reinforced Magnetic Screen Door - Fits Doors up to 38 x 82 Inches (Black)
feature_bullets: INSTALLS IN AN INSTANT - Assembly kit included - All metal black thumbtacks and weather resistant hook and loop backing makes for quick and easy installation and removal. Comes with our FREE VIDEO INSTALLATION TUTORIAL. NOTE: Product packaging design may vary.

FITS ALL DOOR SIZES UP TO 38"x82" - If your door frame measures 38" or less in width and 82" or less in height, then this adjustable hanging screen door will be the perfect fit. Can be used as a replacement for a fixed screen door and fits front, rear, interior or exterior, entry, patio, deck, porch, balcony, glass, garage, and even sliding doors. IMPORTANT: Measure your door before ordering to be sure our screen will fit.

OPENS AND CLOSES LIKE MAGIC - The middle seam of the screen door netting is strategically lined with powerful magnetic cubes and magnet strips that allow the door to open easily and close seamlessly. Includes 26 magnets for the best seal and closure. The folding screen door is also retractable, frameless, and detachable and can be rolled up for temporary storage during the off months and is easily removable.

MULTI FUNCTION DESIGN - Keeps bugs out, lets fresh air in. HANDS-FREE- Allows for easy walkthrough while your hands are full. PET FRIENDLY - Dogs and cats can go inside and outside of the house with ease. Screen net helps keep insects, mosquitos, and flies out.

DURABLE, HEAVY DUTY MESH - Upgraded mesh curtain with a higher thread count than other cheap screens and full reinforced edges survive the test of time. Comes with premium metal black thumbtacks and hook and loop adhesive strips for extra security. Hardware is black and invisible when installed.

specifications.Warranty Description: Lifetime Replacement Guarantee. If you have any issues at all with your Flux Phenom Magnetic Screen Door, then contact us and we will issue a free replacement, for life.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars17,173 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
